<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The module inliner pass for the new pass manager.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This pass wires together the inlining utilities and the inline cost</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// analysis into a module pass. Different from SCC inliner, it considers every</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// call in every function in the whole module and tries to inline if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// profitable. With this module level inliner, it is possible to evaluate more</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// heuristics in the module level such like PriorityInlineOrder. It can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// tuned with a number of parameters to control what cost model is used and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// what tradeoffs are made when making the decision.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/moduleinlinerpass"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/moduleinlinerpass/#a27e6c07945bdbd25d2c8b0255a63663e">ModuleInlinerPass</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/passinfomixin">PassInfoMixin</a>&lt;ModuleInlinerPass&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
